data.message:
Eminem you are my sons favorite rapper ! I wish I could take him to one of your shows 
Your music has helped him through the most painful time of his life his father walked out of his life a year and half ago for his online lover , and my son and I got through a lot of it bonding with some of your songs Thank you

replies.message: Like if you think ICP & Eminem should collab

Jason Statham I'm officially a cool mom because you liked my posted my boys didn't believe me when I said you liked my post they made me show them and then the check your page to make sure it was official so thank you now if Eminem would I like the page it would be amazing thank you 😇
